content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ say hello to sunshine and blooms with the **granny square flower bag** this delightful project is like stitching a garden into your everyday life each beautifully textured granny square blooms with charm and whimsy we will use a *join-as-you-go method* to reduce the number of ends that need to be weaved in then we will *create a fold and sew two seams* finally we ll *add a fun handle to finish* the project this bag pattern comes with a video tutorial crochet hook h 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 1 notions removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 blocking board 5 yarn wecrochet dishie 6 100% cotton 190yds/100g or lily sugar n cream 7 100% cotton 120yds/70g yardage solid bag - 650yds 6 balls three color bag - contrast colors 1 and 2 - 180yds each 2 balls each color main color - 290yds 3 balls yarn substitutes comfy color mist 8 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 219yds/100g lion brand made with love 9 60% cotton 40% acrylic 185yds/100g comfy worsted 10 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 109yds/50g abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stdc - stacked double_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet treble_crochet- treble_crochet gauge each granny square will be 4 x4 not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 11 sizes one size -
